channel.title: Auckland Blood Bowl Federation
channel.description: Recent content on Auckland Blood Bowl Federation

item.title: Welcome to the ABBF
item.description: Hello and welcome to the Auckland Blood Bowl Federation!This is the club page for our long running Blood Bowl league. We run two leagues per year, starting in late Jan and finishing in early Dec. Each season consists of 2-3 preseason builder rounds, 7-8 rounds of the regular season and 1-2 playoff rounds. Our league nights are from 6pm to 9pm on every 2nd Thursday, graciously hosted at Hobbymaster 531 Great South Road, Penrose

item.title: Season 1 League Table
item.description: Table at the end of Round 7.
